When Tainted Denarii enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, choose one –
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• You take imperium. [i](Creatures you cast enter the battlefield with an extra +1/+1 counter. You lose imperium at the end of your turn if you didn’t attack or cast a creature spell.)[/i]
